member.name: T:ClausSoftware.GUI.AutoWaitCursor
member.summary: Stellt einen automatisch arbeitenden Warte-Zustand des Cursors bereit

member.name: F:ClausSoftware.GUI.AutoWaitCursor.DEFAULT_DELAY
member.summary: The default TimeSpan to wait before showing the auto wait cursor.

member.name: F:ClausSoftware.GUI.AutoWaitCursor._appStateMonitor
member.summary: The application state monitor class (which monitors the application busy status).

member.name: M:ClausSoftware.GUI.AutoWaitCursor.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:ClausSoftware.GUI.AutoWaitCursor.ApplicationIdleTime
member.summary: Returns the amount of time the application has been idle.

member.name: P:ClausSoftware.GUI.AutoWaitCursor.IsStarted
member.summary: Returns true if the auto wait cursor has been started.

member.name: P:ClausSoftware.GUI.AutoWaitCursor.Cursor
member.summary: Gets or sets the Cursor to use during Application busy periods.

member.name: P:ClausSoftware.GUI.AutoWaitCursor.Enabled
member.summary: Enables or disables the auto wait cursor.

member.name: P:ClausSoftware.GUI.AutoWaitCursor.Delay
member.summary: Gets or sets the period of Time to wait before showing the WaitCursor whilst Application is working

member.name: P:ClausSoftware.GUI.AutoWaitCursor.MainWindowHandle
member.summary: Gets or sets the main window handle of the application (ie the handle of an MDI form). This is the window handle monitored to detect when the application becomes busy.

member.name: M:ClausSoftware.GUI.AutoWaitCursor.Start
member.summary: Starts the auto wait cursor monitoring the application.

member.name: M:ClausSoftware.GUI.AutoWaitCursor.Start(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Starts the auto wait cursor monitoring the application.
member.param: Specifies the main window handle of the application (ie the handle of an MDI form).

member.name: M:ClausSoftware.GUI.AutoWaitCursor.Stop
member.summary: Stops the auto wait cursor monitoring the application.

member.name: T:ClausSoftware.GUI.AutoWaitCursor.ApplicationStateMonitor
member.summary: Private class that monitors the state of the application and automatically changes the cursor accordingly.

member.name: F:ClausSoftware.GUI.AutoWaitCursor.ApplicationStateMonitor.m_inactiveStart
member.summary: The time the application became inactive.

member.name: F:ClausSoftware.GUI.AutoWaitCursor.ApplicationStateMonitor.m_isStarted
member.summary: If the monitor has been started.

member.name: F:ClausSoftware.GUI.AutoWaitCursor.ApplicationStateMonitor.m_delay
member.summary: Delay to wait before calling back

member.name: F:ClausSoftware.GUI.AutoWaitCursor.ApplicationStateMonitor.m_mainWindowHandle
member.summary: The windows handle to the main process window.

member.name: F:ClausSoftware.GUI.AutoWaitCursor.ApplicationStateMonitor.m_callbackThread
member.summary: Thread to perform the wait and callback

member.name: F:ClausSoftware.GUI.AutoWaitCursor.ApplicationStateMonitor.m_isDisposed
member.summary: Stores if the class has been disposed of.

member.name: F:ClausSoftware.GUI.AutoWaitCursor.ApplicationStateMonitor.m_enabled
member.summary: Stores if the class is enabled or not.

member.summary: GUI Thread Id .

member.name: F:ClausSoftware.GUI.AutoWaitCursor.ApplicationStateMonitor.m_callbackThreadId
member.summary: Callback Thread Id.

member.summary: Stores the old cursor.

member.name: F:ClausSoftware.GUI.AutoWaitCursor.ApplicationStateMonitor.m_waitCursor
member.summary: Stores the new cursor.

member.summary: API - Konstante

member.summary: Default member initialising Constructor.
member.param: The delay before setting the cursor to the wait cursor.

member.name: M:ClausSoftware.GUI.AutoWaitCursor.ApplicationStateMonitor.Dispose
member.summary: On Disposal terminates the Thread, calls Finish (on thread) if Start has been called

member.name: P:ClausSoftware.GUI.AutoWaitCursor.ApplicationStateMonitor.IsStarted
member.summary: Returns true if the auto wait cursor has been started.

member.name: P:ClausSoftware.GUI.AutoWaitCursor.ApplicationStateMonitor.MainWindowHandle
member.summary: Gets or sets the main window handle of the application (ie the handle of an MDI form). This is the window handle monitored to detect when the application becomes busy.

member.name: P:ClausSoftware.GUI.AutoWaitCursor.ApplicationStateMonitor.Cursor
member.summary: Gets or sets the Cursor to show.

member.name: P:ClausSoftware.GUI.AutoWaitCursor.ApplicationStateMonitor.ApplicationIdleTime
member.summary: Returns the amount of time the application has been idle.

member.name: M:ClausSoftware.GUI.AutoWaitCursor.ApplicationStateMonitor.Start
member.summary: Starts the application state monitor.

member.name: M:ClausSoftware.GUI.AutoWaitCursor.ApplicationStateMonitor.Stop
member.summary: Stops the application state monitor.

member.name: M:ClausSoftware.GUI.AutoWaitCursor.ApplicationStateMonitor.SetWaitCursor
member.summary: Set the Cursor to wait.

member.name: M:ClausSoftware.GUI.AutoWaitCursor.ApplicationStateMonitor.RestoreCursor
member.summary: Finish showing the Cursor (switch back to previous Cursor).

member.name: P:ClausSoftware.GUI.AutoWaitCursor.ApplicationStateMonitor.Enabled
member.summary: Enable/Disable the call to Start (note, once Start is called it *always* calls the paired Finish).

member.name: P:ClausSoftware.GUI.AutoWaitCursor.ApplicationStateMonitor.Delay
member.summary: Gets or sets the period of Time to wait before calling the Start method.

member.name: M:ClausSoftware.GUI.AutoWaitCursor.ApplicationStateMonitor.CreateMonitorThread
member.summary: Prepares the class creating a Thread that monitors the main application state.

member.name: M:ClausSoftware.GUI.AutoWaitCursor.ApplicationStateMonitor.ThreadCallbackLoop
member.summary: Thread callback method. Loops calling SetWaitCursor and RestoreCursor until Disposed.

member.name: M:ClausSoftware.GUI.AutoWaitCursor.ApplicationStateMonitor.IsApplicationBusy(System.TimeSpan,System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Blocks until the application responds to a test message. If the application doesn't respond with the timespan, will return false, else returns true.

member.name: M:ClausSoftware.GUI.AutoWaitCursor.ApplicationStateMonitor.WaitForIdle
member.summary: Waits for the ResetEvent (set by Dispose and Reset), since Start has been called we *have* to call RestoreCursor once the thread is idle again.

member.name: M:ClausSoftware.GUI.AutoWaitCursor.ApplicationStateMonitor.OnApplicationThreadExit(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: The application is closing, shut the state monitor down.
member.param: The instance containing the event data.
